Drift Institutional is here.

A new white-glove service to help institutions bring real-world assets onchain into 
@solana
's DeFi ecosystem — starting with a first-of-its-kind Institutional Pool for Apollo’s tokenized credit fund.

Where do you think $SOL goes from here?

FUEL Rewards Program Update

The FUEL Rewards Program is in its final phase and will be ending soon — the official end date will be announced shortly.

Here’s what you need to know

A claim page will be available a few weeks after the FUEL program concludes

There will be a new version of the incentives program once the FUEL claim is concluded. Stay tuned!

In line with our commitment to fairness:

• Wallets identified for wash trading will be disqualified for rewards
• Volume generated through wash trading will not count towards milestone tracking.

For any questions and further updates, join Drift's Discord channel -

Big deal day for Solana DeFi.

Institutional yield once reserved for private credit desks is coming

Institutions are coming onchain.

Drift Institutional brings DeFi utility to RWAs with leverage, yield, and isolated risk baked in.

Real assets. Real capital. Real DeFi.
Learn more:

This is a new chapter for internet capital markets.

Historically, credit-based lending was reserved for $100M+ private deals. Now, with tokenized funds and DeFi rails, Drift unlocks access to strategies previously gated to larger institutions.
